Source.Name: graphicsmagick
Source.Summary: GraphicsMagick provides a set of commandline tools and programming APIs for manipulating, editing, and converting raster and vector images.
Source.Description: GraphicsMagick provides a set of commandline tools and programming APIs for manipulating, editing, and converting raster and vector images. It is derived from ImageMagick, with the objective of providing better stability and performance than ImageMagick.

Package.Description: GraphicsMagick provides a set of commandline tools and programming APIs for manipulating, editing, and converting raster and vector images. It is derived from ImageMagick, with the objective of providing better stability and performance than ImageMagick.
